Title: Uchuu no Kishi Tekkaman Blade OVA: Twin Blood
Description: ["Twin Blood is an alternate version of Blade and Evil's first battle, with drastically different character and mecha designs from the rest of the series. Blade/D-Boy does not need Pegas to transform and the armor more closely resembles the Radam humanoids from Tekkaman Blade II."]
Related: ['Alternative version: Uchuu no Kishi Tekkaman Blade']
